description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation ('Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in LambertGroup SHOUT - HTML5 Radio Player With Ads - ShoutCast and IceCast Support allows Reflected XSS. This issue affects SHOUT - HTML5 Radio Player With Ads - ShoutCast and IceCast Support: from n/a through 3.5.4.

product.name: SHOUT - HTML5 Radio Player With Ads - ShoutCast and IceCast Support
